p.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, using a set of codes to describe the diagnosis events of allergies or adverse reactions.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Allergy Or Adverse Reaction DE SnCT subset with subset original id 52741000000130.

p.p: The use of this subset is Mandatory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
